post:
<a name="byteshack"></a>

# [Byteshack](#byteshack)
Our Byteshack platform is aimed at people who need blazing fast disk, whether for real-world use or to run dd tests.


**Baby XEN**

* 1 Shared Core
* 128 MB RAM
* 2GB RAID10 SSD
* 100GB @ 1 Gbps
* XEN HVM
* $18/year
* Order: [Buffalo](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=104), [Dallas](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=113), or [Los Angeles](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=158)


**XEN Mini**

* 2 Shared Cores 
* 256 MB RAM 
* 5GB RAID10 SSD
* 300GB @ 1 Gbps 
* XEN HVM 
* $2.7/month
* Order: [Buffalo](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=101), [Dallas](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=112), or [Los Angeles](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=156)


**XEN Midi**

* 2 Shared Cores 
* 512 MB RAM 
* 10GB RAID10 SSD 
* 500GB @ 1 Gbps 
* XEN HVM 
* $5/month
* Order: [Buffalo](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=102), [Dallas](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=115), or [Los Angeles](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=160)


**XEN Maxi**

* 2 Shared Cores 
* 1024 MB RAM 
* 20GB RAID10 SSD 
* 1024GB @ 1 Gbps 
* XEN HVM 
* $7/month with the coupon 1PWFZ58HT
* Order: [Buffalo](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=103), [Dallas](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=117), or [Los Angeles](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=162)

<a name="xenstorage">

# [XENStorage](#xenstorage)
XENStorage servers come with a large amount of disk space to store your files.  It can serve as a great backup server.  Purchase one today and worry about its purpose later.


**XENStorage 100G**

* 2 Shared Cores 
* 512 MB RAM 
* 100GB Disk 
* 500GB @ 1 Gbps 
* XEN HVM 
* $20/year
* Order: [Dallas](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=199)

**XENStorage 200G**

* 4 Shared Cores
* 2048 MB RAM 
* 200GB Disk 
* 1000GB @ 1 Gbps 
* XEN HVM 
* $7/month or $48/year
* Order: [Dallas](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=200)

<a name="vikinglayer"></a>

# [VikingLayer](#vikinglayer)
Also equipped with pure SSD drives, our VikingLayer platform is similar to our Byteshack products.  This is our OpenVZ version of Byteshack, which means lower costs for you.  




**Farmer**

* 1 CPU Core 
* 128 MB RAM 
* 5GB RAID10 SSD 
* 256GB @ 1 Gbps 
* OpenVZ
* €1.00/month or €10.00/year
* Order: [Buffalo, NY](https://vikinglayer.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=23)

<hr>
**Some words from our clients and fellow LET members:**

* https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/19342/review-of-drserver-net-the-best-host
* https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/51723/honest-review-drserver-is-da-best
* https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/58273/byteshack-net-drserver-net-review-absolutely-fantastic-5-month-review
<hr>
**FAQs**

> Q: Do you offer refunds? <br />
> A: We offer a 30-day refund period for your first service with us.
> 
> Q: Can I run X or Y? <br />
> A: Check out our [AUP](https://drserver.net/usage) to be sure.
> 
> Q: Test IP? <br />
> A: Submit a ticket and we will gladly provide you with one.
> 
> Q: What payment methods do you accept? <br />
> A: We accept payments via PayPal, BitPay, and 2Checkout.
> 
> Q: Can you make me a custom deal? <br />
> A: Sure.  We know everyone has their own needs and are ready to accommodate to yours the best we can. Just [submit a ticket](https://drserver.net/drbill/index.php?/tickets/new/) to our sales department and it will be taken care of in a timely manner. 
> 
> Q: Are orders instantly set up? <br />
> A: All VPS products, with the exception of VikingLayer, are manually set up by our staff. Orders are usually set up within a few hours of payment and passing screening checks.
>
> Q: There's only 4 locations listed, but the thread title claims 5. <br />
> A:  We also have presence in Lenoir, North Carolina.  At this moment, we do not have a public offer for it.  If you are interested, feel free to submit a ticket for more information.
<hr />
Leave your comments or questions below or submit a ticket.  I'm also available via PM to take your questions.

Have a nice day!
